languages.text: Направили ресурсы в посольство Пустотному братству

traits.locale_text: Направили ресурсы в посольство Пустотному братству

languages.text: Пираты отлично понимают, куда дуют пустотные ветра, и желают получить покровительство быстро набирающей мощь династии фон Валанциус. За материальную поддержку их флота пираты обещают процент от награбленного и свою сомнительную дружбу.

Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.
languages.original_text: Пираты отлично понимают, куда дуют пустотные ветра, и желают получить покровительство быстро набирающей мощь династии фон Валанциус. За материальную поддержку их флота пираты обещают процент от награбленного и свою сомнительную дружбу.

traits.locale_text: Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, the pirates are offering a percentage of their loot and the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, the pirates are offering a percentage of their loot and the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

languages.text: 众多海盗敏锐地意识到虚空之中的风向变了。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝迅速崛起，他们也在努力寻求这个王朝的赞助。为了换取冯·瓦兰修斯王朝舰队的支持，他们愿意提供一定比例的战利品，还愿意献上他们的友谊，尽管海盗对“友谊”这个词的理解值得商榷。
languages.original_text: Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

traits.locale_text: 众多海盗敏锐地意识到虚空之中的风向变了。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝迅速崛起，他们也在努力寻求这个王朝的赞助。为了换取冯·瓦兰修斯王朝舰队的支持，他们愿意提供一定比例的战利品，还愿意献上他们的友谊，尽管海盗对“友谊”这个词的理解值得商榷。

languages.text: ヴォイドの風向きを鋭く読んだ海賊たちは、急速に台頭するフォン・ヴァランシウス家の庇護を求めている。自分たちの艦隊に対する物質的支援と引き換えに、戦利品の一部を分け前として差し出すだけではなく、それがいかに疑わしくとも、真の友情も提供しようと言っている。
languages.original_text: Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドの風向きを鋭く読んだ海賊たちは、急速に台頭するフォン・ヴァランシウス家の庇護を求めている。自分たちの艦隊に対する物質的支援と引き換えに、戦利品の一部を分け前として差し出すだけではなく、それがいかに疑わしくとも、真の友情も提供しようと言っている。

languages.text: Die Piraten wissen genau, aus welcher Richtung der Leerenwind weht, und suchen die Gunst des rasch aufsteigenden Hauses Valancius. Im Austausch für die materielle Unterstützung ihrer Flotte bietet sie einen prozentualen Anteil ihrer Beute sowie ihre unverbrüchliche Freundschaft (eine etwas zweifelhafte Ehre).
languages.original_text: Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

traits.locale_text: Die Piraten wissen genau, aus welcher Richtung der Leerenwind weht, und suchen die Gunst des rasch aufsteigenden Hauses Valancius. Im Austausch für die materielle Unterstützung ihrer Flotte bietet sie einen prozentualen Anteil ihrer Beute sowie ihre unverbrüchliche Freundschaft (eine etwas zweifelhafte Ehre).

languages.text: Uçsuz rüzgârlarının yönünü iyi okuyan korsanlar, süratle yükselen von Valancius Hanesi'nin himayesine talip. Filolarına verilecek maddi destek karşılığında ganimetlerinden pay ve kuşkulu bir beyan olsa da "sonsuz dostluk" sunuyorlar.
languages.original_text: Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

traits.locale_text: Uçsuz rüzgârlarının yönünü iyi okuyan korsanlar, süratle yükselen von Valancius Hanesi'nin himayesine taliptir. Filolarına verilecek maddi destek karşılığında ganimetlerinden pay ve kuşkulu bir beyan olsa da "sonsuz dostluk" sunarlar.

languages.text: Plenamente consciente de la dirección en la que soplan los vientos del vacío, los piratas buscan el patrocinio de la casa von Valancius, en rápido ascenso. A cambio de apoyo material para su flota, ofrecen un porcentaje de su botín junto con su sincera amistad, por dudoso que resulte el concepto.
languages.original_text: Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

traits.locale_text: Plenamente consciente de la dirección en la que soplan los vientos del vacío, los piratas buscan el patrocinio de la casa von Valancius, en rápido ascenso. A cambio de apoyo material para su flota, ofrecen un porcentaje de su botín junto con su sincera amistad, por dudoso que resulte el concepto.

languages.text: Lorsque le vent tourne, les pirates sont les premiers à le sentir. Au vu de l'ascension rapide de la maison von Valancius, ils souhaitent se placer sous sa protection. En échange d'un soutien matériel pour leur flotte, ils offrent un pourcentage de leur butin ainsi que leur amitié indéfectible, aussi douteux que cela puisse paraître.
languages.original_text: Keenly aware which way the void winds are blowing, the pirates are seeking the patronage of the swiftly ascending House von Valancius. In exchange for material support of their fleet, they are offering a percentage of their loot, as well as the fullness of their friendship, as dubious as that notion is.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le vent tourne, les pirates sont les premiers à le sentir. Au vu de l'ascension rapide de la maison von Valancius, ils souhaitent se placer sous sa protection. En échange d'un soutien matériel pour leur flotte, ils offrent un pourcentage de leur butin ainsi que leur amitié indéfectible, aussi douteux que cela puisse paraître.
